changelog:
## Changes in v1.0.39

### Sport Section - Improved
- FIXED: No more loading screen when opening channel from Sport
- FIXED: Player starts immediately, channels load in background
- FIXED: Dashboard panels restored correctly when returning from Sport

### Playlist Refresh - Now Real!
- FIXED: 'Aggiorna' in Settings > Playlist now does REAL sync
- Uses same smart hash check as Data Sync
- Shows 'Nessuna modifica' if unchanged

### Smart Sync Reminder
- FIRST sync after update will be slow (new hash format)
- SUBSEQUENT syncs will be fast if unchanged (~3 seconds)

### Previous fixes
- v1.0.38: Smart Sync with MD5 hash check
- v1.0.37: Sport fullscreen navigation
